brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to understand safety (e.g., occurrence of adverse drug
      reactions [ADRs]) and efficacy data on the long-term use of Vyndaqel Capsules (hereinafter
      referred to as Vyndaqel) in all patients who received this drug under actual use conditions
      after its marketing.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vyndaqel Drug Use Investigation (Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan)

detailed_description.textblock:
Both prospective and retrospective is acceptable All the patients whom an investigator
      prescribes Vyndaqel should be registered

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        The subjects of this surveillance are all patients who received Vyndaqel.

        Exclusion Criteria:

        Patients not receive Vyndaqel.

study_pop.textblock: The subjects of this surveillance are all patients who received Vyndaqel.

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.official_title: Vyndaqel Drug Use Investigation (Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan)

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse drug reaction in this study

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline on the following scale; NIS, QOL-DN, mBMI
